%mdk-data-line={21}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e29d30cd0a4e21f5ce9b99ef89033aaf]%mdk
$ed = 1 \pmod {\phi(m)} \implies ed = k\phi(m) + 1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={21}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[ab7b589c32d33eff3dd7af7bf9848b99]%mdk
$k \in \Z$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={21}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[0299125cf9a1f69dd835f75b356161e8]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={24}
\begin{aligned}
(x^e)^d &= x^{ed} \pmod{m} \\
&= x^{k\phi(m) + 1} \pmod{m}\\
&=  x^{k\phi(m)}x \pmod{m}\\
&= (x^{\phi(m)})^kx\pmod{m} \\
&= 1^kx \pmod{m}\\
&= x \pmod{m}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={33}

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[ad1709560735f29c77b9c919a0b3d82e]%mdk
$\frac{2^n}{2^{2n}} = \frac{1}{2^n}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={147}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[232d4149a9ef6213e800c018288a3b8b]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={148}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b21f612b0467f9ffaf1a70941198c740]%mdk
$V_{v'}(m^*,\sigma^*) = 0$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={148}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[cfcd208495d565ef66e7dff9f98764da]%mdk
$0$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={148}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[b2663b9666b2e2bdfb3b10ef9531add1]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={150}
\begin{aligned}
|\E[D(PRG(U_n)] - \E[D(U_n)]| &=  |\E[D(PRG(U_n) \mid \mathcal{E}]\Pr[\mathcal{E}] + \E[D(PRG(U_n) \mid \mathcal{E}^c]\Pr[\mathcal{E}^c] \\
&-\E[D(U_n) \mid \mathcal{E}]\Pr[\mathcal{E}]- \E[D(U_n) \mid \mathcal{E}^c]\Pr[\mathcal{E}^c]| \\
&= |(1-negl(n)) - \frac{1}{2^n}(1 - negl(n)) - (1 - \frac{1}{2^n})(0)| \\
&= 1 - negl'(n)
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={157}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[f623e75af30e62bbd73d6df5b50bb7b5]%mdk

$m_j = b'$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={159}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[5cc6382fe9a1ecdb87306389257ef647]%mdk
$m_j = b'$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={160}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[93b05c90d14a117ba52da1d743a43ab1]%mdk
$\frac{1}{2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={160}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[29d5113484ac4506f132e978d9eb1058]%mdk
$b' \in_R \zo$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={160}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[f623e75af30e62bbd73d6df5b50bb7b5]%mdk
$D$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={160}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c4ca4238a0b923820dcc509a6f75849b]%mdk
$1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={161}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[93b05c90d14a117ba52da1d743a43ab1]%mdk
$\frac{1}{2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={161}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[3a2f42c3018daf06b58382ccf42d545f]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={163}
\begin{aligned}
|\E[D(PRG(U_n)] - \E[D(U_n)]| &=  |\E[D(PRG(U_n) \mid m_j = b']\Pr[m_j = b'] \\
&+\E[D(PRG(U_n) \mid m_j \neq b']\Pr[m_j \neq b'] \\
&-\E[D(U_n) \mid m_j = b']\Pr[m_j = b']\\
 &- \E[D(U_n) \mid m_j \neq b']\Pr[m_j \neq b']| \\
&= |\frac{1}{4} + \frac{1}{2}\E[D(PRG(U_n) \mid m_j \neq b'] - \frac{1}{4} \\
&- \frac{1}{2}\E[D(PRG(U_n) \mid m_j \neq b']| \\
&= \frac{1}{2} - \frac{negl'(n)}{2}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\[%mdk-data-line={251}
\begin{aligned}
2[\iprod{w,y} + \lfloor q/2 \rfloor] + 1 &= 2\iprod{w,y} + 2\lfloor k +  1/2 \rfloor + 1 \pmod{q}\\
&= 2\iprod{w,y} + 2k + 1 \pmod{q} \\
&= 2\iprod{w,y} + q \pmod{q} \\
&= 2\iprod{w,y} \pmod{q}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={258}

\begin{aligned}
|\iprod{a,x} - \sigma| &= |\iprod{2w^\top A, x}- 2\iprod{w,y} +- b| \\
&= |2\iprod{w,Ax} - 2\iprod{w,Ax} - 2\iprod{w,e} - b|| \\
&= |2\iprod{w,e} + b| 
\end{aligned}
